page.title: 12SPORT AND LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content:
There is one canal and one river.These are both used for Fishing,Boating, Barging and Canoeing.Every two years, there is a big fancy dress boat race. They go from Micklethwaite to the Five Rise Locks. The main fishing competition is at the Gala which is held every year. For canoeing they go up and down the canal and the finals are held six months after.The canal is called the Leeds and Liverpool Canal,because of the two main cities that it runs through.
BARGES People often use barges for holidays or just to pass time.There are two types of barges-Continental and Open Air.The open air barges are used just for the day and are literally open air with a base underneath for eating in.
